item.title: CF580C - Kefa and Park
item.description: CF580C - Kefa and Park Depth-first search but maintain $s$ the number of consecutive cats till vertex $u$. If $s>m$, leaves. If $u$ is not vertex 1 and the degree of $u$ is 1, i.
